description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、政治哲学学者，生于基隆市，曾任行政院院长、副院长、内政部部长等职务。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and political philosophy scholar, born in Keelung. He has served as Premier, Vice Premier, and Minister of the Interior of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。在其总统任内，江宜桦历任政府要职。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President of the Republic of China. During his presidency, Jiang Yi-huah held several key government positions.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。江宜桦曾是其内阁的行政院副院长，并接替其出任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Premier. Jiang Yi-huah served as his Vice Premier and later succeeded him as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。江宜桦在其内阁中担任内政部部长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Premier. Jiang Yi-huah served as Minister of the Interior in his cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。江宜桦在其内阁中担任行政院研究发展考核委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Premier. Jiang Yi-huah served as the head of the Research, Development and Evaluation Commission in his cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任江宜桦内阁的行政院副院长，并接替其出任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Vice Premier in Jiang Yi-huah's cabinet and later succeeded him as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 2014年台湾的一场学生与公民运动，抗议者占领立法院。时任行政院院长江宜桦下令警察镇压驱逐民众，引发激烈冲突。
description.en: A student and civic movement in Taiwan in 2014, where protesters occupied the Legislative Yuan. Then-Premier Jiang Yi-huah ordered police to suppress and evict the protesters, leading to intense conflict.

nodes.id: 2014年中华民国地方公职人员选举

zh-cn: 2014年中华民国地方公职人员选举

description.zh-cn: 中华民国于2014年举行的地方公职人员选举。执政的国民党在该次选举中败选，导致时任行政院院长江宜桦请辞。
description.en: Local elections held in the Republic of China in 2014. The ruling Kuomintang's defeat in the election led to the resignation of then-Premier Jiang Yi-huah.

description.zh-cn: 台北市立大学历史与地理学系教授，江宜桦的妻子。
description.en: Professor in the Department of History and Geography at the University of Taipei, and the wife of Jiang Yi-huah.

description.zh-cn: 江宜桦之父，生于福建漳州，1949年赴台。
description.en: Father of Jiang Yi-huah, born in Zhangzhou, Fujian, and moved to Taiwan in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的顶尖研究型大学，江宜桦曾在此获得学士及硕士学位，并长期担任教授。
description.en: A top research university in Taiwan where Jiang Yi-huah earned his bachelor's and master's degrees, and served as a professor for many years.

description.zh-cn: 美国私立研究型大学，江宜桦在此获得政治学博士学位。
description.en: A private American research university where Jiang Yi-huah obtained his Ph.D. in political science.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，江宜桦为其党员。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China, of which Jiang Yi-huah is a member.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 维吾尔族人权活动家，世界维吾尔代表大会主席。2009年，时任内政部部长的江宜桦以国家安全为由禁止其入境台湾。
description.en: A Uyghur human rights activist and president of the World Uyghur Congress. In 2009, then-Minister of the Interior Jiang Yi-huah denied her entry into Taiwan on national security grounds.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，与江宜桦为建国中学同届校友。曾任立法委员，期间就禁止热比娅入境一事质询江宜桦。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a high school alumnus of Jiang Yi-huah from the same year. As a legislator, he questioned Jiang regarding the decision to deny Rebiya Kadeer entry.

description.zh-cn: 江宜桦与李淑珍为夫妻关系，两人在就读大学时结识。
description.en: Jiang Yi-huah and Li Shu-chen are married. They met when they were university students.

description.zh-cn: 江木吉是江宜桦的父亲。
description.en: Jiang Mu-ji is Jiang Yi-huah's father.

degree.zh-cn: 政治学学士、政治学硕士
degree.en: Bachelor of Political Science, Master of Political Science

description.zh-cn: 江宜桦于1983年获得国立台湾大学政治学学士学位，1987年获得硕士学位。
description.en: Jiang Yi-huah received his Bachelor's degree in Political Science from National Taiwan University in 1983, and his Master's degree in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 江宜桦于1993年获得耶鲁大学政治学博士学位。
description.en: Jiang Yi-huah received his Ph.D. in Political Science from Yale University in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 江宜桦于2012年10月重回中国国民党。
description.en: Jiang Yi-huah rejoined the Kuomintang in October 2012.

description.zh-cn: 在马英九总统任内，江宜桦被任命为行政院院长。
description.en: During President Ma Ying-jeou's term, Jiang Yi-huah was appointed as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

position.en: Vice Premier of the Executive Yuan

description.zh-cn: 在陈冲担任行政院院长期间，江宜桦是其内阁的行政院副院长。
description.en: While Sean Chen was Premier, Jiang Yi-huah served as the Vice Premier in his cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 在吴敦义担任行政院院长期间，江宜桦是其内阁的内政部部长。
description.en: While Wu Den-yih was Premier, Jiang Yi-huah served as the Minister of the Interior in his cabinet.

position.zh-cn: 行政院研究发展考核委员会主任委员
position.en: Minister of the Research, Development and Evaluation Commission

description.zh-cn: 在刘兆玄担任行政院院长期间，江宜桦是其内阁的行政院研究发展考核委员会主任委员。
description.en: While Liu Chao-shiuan was Premier, Jiang Yi-huah served as the Minister of the Research, Development and Evaluation Commission in his cabinet.

position.en: Vice Premier of the Executive Yuan

description.zh-cn: 在江宜桦担任行政院院长期间，毛治国是其内阁的行政院副院长。
description.en: While Jiang Yi-huah was Premier, Mao Chi-kuo served as the Vice Premier in his cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 在太阳花学运期间，时任行政院院长江宜桦下令警察镇压驱逐民众，致多人受伤，被抗争者称为“杀人院长”，双方处于敌对状态。
description.en: During the Sunflower Student Movement, then-Premier Jiang Yi-huah ordered the police to suppress and evict protesters, causing multiple injuries. Protesters called him the 'murderer premier', indicating a hostile relationship.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国地方公职人员选举

description.zh-cn: 由于执政的国民党在2014年地方公职人员选举中败选，时任行政院院长江宜桦为此请辞下台。
description.en: Due to the ruling Kuomintang's defeat in the 2014 local elections, then-Premier Jiang Yi-huah resigned to take responsibility.

description.zh-cn: 2009年9月，时任内政部部长的江宜桦以国家安全为由，禁止世界维吾尔代表大会主席热比娅入境台湾。
description.en: In September 2009, then-Minister of the Interior Jiang Yi-huah denied entry to Taiwan for Rebiya Kadeer, president of the World Uyghur Congress, citing national security concerns.

description.zh-cn: 时任立法委员的赖清德就禁止热比娅入境台湾一事，在立法院对内政部部长江宜桦提出质询与批评。
description.en: Then-legislator Lai Ching-te questioned and criticized Minister of the Interior Jiang Yi-huah in the Legislative Yuan over the decision to deny Rebiya Kadeer entry to Taiwan.

position.en: Associate Professor, Professor of Political Science

description.zh-cn: 江宜桦自1995年起在国立台湾大学政治学系任教，1999年升任教授，直至2012年进入行政院任职。
description.en: Jiang Yi-huah taught at the Department of Political Science at National Taiwan University starting in 1995, was promoted to full professor in 1999, and served until he joined the Executive Yuan in 2012.
